text:
Aww yeah, let's learn how to give advice in 
English with Sandra Bullock. Now, today's

lesson is with the incredible movie The Blind 
Side, which is based on the true story of the

successful American football player Michael Oher. 
Sandra Bullock gives a very powerful performance,

which actually won her an Oscar. And in 
this film she gives Michael lots of advice

on football and college life, so it's great to 
help you learn English on how to give advice.

In case you're new here, we want 
to let you know that every week we

make lessons just like this one. To help 
you learn English without getting lost,

without missing the jokes and without 
subtitles. In fact Franc says that

learning with our channel is fun 
and he's learned lots of grammar,

vocabulary and even American and British culture. 
So if that sounds good to you, don't forget to hit

that Subscribe button and the Bell down below, 
so that you don't miss any of our new lessons.

Do you still struggle to understand fast 
speaking natives? Then why not check out

our Fluent with Friends course? In this 
48-week course you will learn with the

first two seasons of Friends. You'll receive PDF 
power lessons, vocabulary memorization software,

access to our Fluency Circle Global Community 
and so much more! And did you know that you

can try it right now for FREE with our 3-Part 
Masterclass? All you have to do is click up

here or in the description box below, to learn 
more and sign up now. We hope to see you there!

If you enjoy learning English with movies then 
why not check out our lesson on the Hunger Games,

where you can learn lots more vocabulary 
and pronunciation. You can click up here

or in the description box below to 
watch it straight after this lesson.
